Reviews.Title: “A nice alternative for a visit to Amsterdam and still feel in the country”
Reviews.Author: jmk50_3
Reviews.Content: reading reviews tripadvisor nice stay 2 day visit amsterdam surroundings decided inquiries prices availability email answered owner referred website helpful drove look ourselves welcomed friendly helpful manager available satisfied booked 104 called captain haddock front floor days week return trip nice spacious cosy wooden furniture totally style 19 century sea master mattresses touch firmer thats matter personal taste lovely dinner giant sea sole poached butter delicious expensive worth breakfast simple tasty dutch coffee white grain slices bread cold cuts dutch cheese marmalade dutch chocolate chips dont breakfast cook eggs internet wifi free modern technology rfid cards light switches reacting movement holland wholeheartedly recommend possibilities tourist office nice prepared walk bike

Reviews.Title: “stay somewhere else”
Reviews.Author: Mikeyy
Reviews.Content: limited looking stay american hotel holland looked fit bill originally fishermans house booked priceline days vacation six hotel house rest added car restaurant food average service bad stayed clean superior view neighbors yard sea view unless looking sleep overall bargain arent bargains amsterdam season drove gardens pretty close 31 heineken experience 10 nice waterfront wont
